title: 一些脑洞。
content: 随手记点脑洞。 全波段分立/低集成收发信机 带示波器频谱仪信号源逻分的便携平台 CMOS三进制计算机

title: A Brief Introduction To Setting Up A Blog
content: pdf-plugin baidu About how to set up another environmentPreparationnodejs (cnpm) git hexo init1 Create a folder 2 cd folder, hexo init 3 move source, themes, scaffolds into the folder 4 install packages: hexo-renderer-pandoc pandoc hexo-filter-mathjax hexo-asset-image
